13 class FaustStream : public AudioStreamX {
14  public:
16  FaustStream(dsp &dsp, bool useSeparateOutputBuffer=true) {
17  p_dsp = &dsp;
18  p_dsp->buildUserInterface(&ui);
19  with_output_buffer = useSeparateOutputBuffer;
20  }
21 
23  FaustStream(dsp &dsp, AudioStream &out, bool useSeparateOutputBuffer=true){
24  p_out = &out;
25  p_dsp = &dsp;
26  p_dsp->buildUserInterface(&ui);
27  with_output_buffer = useSeparateOutputBuffer;
28  }
29 
30  ~FaustStream(){
31  end();
32  deleteFloatBuffer();
33  }
34 
35  AudioBaseInfo defaultConfig() {
36  AudioBaseInfo def;
37  def.channels = p_dsp->getNumOutputs();
38  def.bits_per_sample = 16;
39  def.sample_rate = 44100;
40  return def;
41  }
42 
44  virtual FAUSTFLOAT getLabelValue(const char*label) {
45  return ui.getValue(label);
46  }
47 
49  virtual bool setLabelValue(const char*label, FAUSTFLOAT value){
50  bool result if (!is_read && !is_write) LOGE("setLabelValue must be called after begin");
51  = ui.setValue(label, value);
52  LOGI("setLabelValue('%s',%f) -> %s", label, value, result?"true":"false");
53  return result;
54  }
55 
57  bool begin(AudioBaseInfo cfg){
58  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
59  bool result = true;
60  this->cfg = cfg;
61  bytes_per_sample = cfg.bits_per_sample/8;
62  p_dsp->init(cfg.sample_rate);
63 
64  // we do expect an output
65  result = checkChannels();
66 
67  // allocate array of channel data
68  if (p_buffer==nullptr){
69  p_buffer = new float*[cfg.channels]();
70  }
71  if (with_output_buffer && p_buffer_out==nullptr){
72  p_buffer_out = new float*[cfg.channels]();
73  }
74 
75  LOGI("is_read: %s", is_read?"true":"false");
76  LOGI("is_write: %s", is_write?"true":"false");
77 
78  return result;
79  }
80 
82  void end() {
83  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
84  is_read = false;
85  is_write = false;
86  p_dsp->instanceClear();
87  }
88 
90  size_t readBytes(uint8_t *data, size_t len) override {
91  size_t result = 0;
92  if (is_read){
93  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
94  result = len;
95  int samples = len / bytes_per_sample;
96  allocateFloatBuffer(samples, false);
97  p_dsp->compute(samples, nullptr, p_buffer);
98  // convert from float to int16
99  convertFloatBufferToInt16(samples, data, p_buffer);
100  }
101  return result;
102  }
103 
105  size_t write(const uint8_t *write_data, size_t len) override {
106  size_t result = 0;
107  if (is_write){
108  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
109  int samples = len / bytes_per_sample;
110  allocateFloatBuffer(samples, with_output_buffer);
111  int16_t *data16 = (int16_t*) write_data;
112  // convert to float
113  for(int j=0;j<samples;j+=cfg.channels){
114  for(int i=0;i<cfg.channels;i++){
115  p_buffer[i][j] = static_cast<float>(data16[j+i])/32767.0;
116  }
117  }
118  float** p_float_out = with_output_buffer ? p_buffer_out : p_buffer;
119  p_dsp->compute(samples, p_buffer, p_float_out);
120  // update buffer with data from faust
121  convertFloatBufferToInt16(samples,(void*) write_data, p_float_out);
122  // write data to final output
123  result = p_out->write(write_data, len);
124  }
125  return result;
126  }
127 
128  int available() override {
129  return DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE;
130  }
131 
132  int availableForWrite() override {
133  return DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE / 4; // we limit the write size to
134  }
135 
136  protected:
137  bool is_init = false;
138  bool is_read = false;
139  bool is_write = false;
140  bool with_output_buffer;
141  int bytes_per_sample;
142  int buffer_allocated;
143  dsp *p_dsp = nullptr;
144  AudioBaseInfo cfg;
145  AudioStream *p_out=nullptr;
146  float** p_buffer=nullptr;
147  float** p_buffer_out=nullptr;
148  UI ui;
149 
151  bool checkChannels() {
152  bool result = true;
153  if (p_dsp->getNumOutputs()>0){
154  if (p_dsp->getNumOutputs()==cfg.channels){
155  is_read = true;
156  } else {
157  LOGE("NumOutputs is not matching with number of channels");
158  result = false;
159  }
160  if (p_dsp->getNumInputs()!=0 && p_dsp->getNumInputs()!=cfg.channels){
161  LOGE("NumInputs is not matching with number of channels");
162  result = false;
163  }
164  if (p_dsp->getNumInputs()>0){
165  if (p_out!=nullptr){
166  is_write = true;
167  } else {
168  LOGE("Faust expects input - you need to provide and AudioStream in the constructor");
169  result = false;
170  }
171  }
172  }
173  return result;
174  }
175 
177  void convertFloatBufferToInt16(int samples, void *data, float**p_float_out){
178  int16_t *data16 = (int16_t*) data;
179  for (int j=0;j<samples;j+=cfg.channels){
180  for (int i=0;i<cfg.channels;i++){
181  data16[j+i]=p_float_out[i][j]*32767;
182  }
183  }
184  }
185 
187  void allocateFloatBuffer(int samples, bool allocate_out){
188  if (samples>buffer_allocated){
189  if (p_buffer[0]!=nullptr){
190  for (int j=0;j<cfg.channels;j++){
191  delete[]p_buffer[j];
192  p_buffer[j] = nullptr;
193  }
194  }
195  if (p_buffer_out!=nullptr && p_buffer_out[0]!=nullptr){
196  for (int j=0;j<cfg.channels;j++){
197  delete[]p_buffer_out[j];
198  p_buffer_out[j] = nullptr;
199  }
200  }
201  }
202  if (p_buffer[0]==nullptr){
203  const int ch = cfg.channels;
204  for (int j=0;j<cfg.channels;j++){
205  p_buffer[j] = new float[samples];
206  }
207  buffer_allocated = samples;
208  }
209  if (allocate_out){
210  if (p_buffer_out[0]==nullptr){
211  const int ch = cfg.channels;
212  for (int j=0;j<cfg.channels;j++){
213  p_buffer_out[j] = new float[samples];
214  }
215  }
216  }
217  }
218 
219  void deleteFloatBuffer() {
220  if (p_buffer!=nullptr) {
221  for (int j=0;j<cfg.channels;j++){
222  if (p_buffer[j]!=nullptr) delete p_buffer[j];
223  }
224  delete[] p_buffer;
225  p_buffer = nullptr;
226  }
227  if (p_buffer_out!=nullptr) {
228  for (int j=0;j<cfg.channels;j++){
229  if (p_buffer_out[j]!=nullptr) delete p_buffer_out[j];
230  }
231  delete[] p_buffer_out;
232  p_buffer_out = nullptr;
233  }
234  }
235 };
236 
237 } // namespace
